name: GunSmoke (itch)
description:
Gun Smoke is a top down shooter. You play as a cowboy and as you walk forward through town to take out the bandit boss you can shoot left forward or right to take out bandits along the way.

Controls:

Move:  WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot left:  Z, J or Left mouse button

Shoot straight:  X, K or Middle mouse button

Shoot right:  C, L or Right mouse button

Pause: ESC

This is a student project.

Made By:

Ben Grundy

Brendan Rose

Jamie Carmichael
